row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANT# = '&MANDANTEN#' :SET &PROTO_SEL# = 'J' :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'AZNBatch_Selekt' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '480' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &EXTOUTFILE1# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.fp' :SET &EXTOUTFILE2# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.tp' ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1 = "Mandant: &MANDANT#" :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 = "Verarb: &VALUTA_VON#-&VALUTA_BIS#" ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VON = &VALUTA_VON# BIS = &VALUTA_BIS# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# OHNEINBEARB = &OHNEINBEARB# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# MANDANT = &MANDANT# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# OPTIONS = &OPTIONS# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# EXTOUTFILE1 = &EXTOUTFILE1# EXTOUTFILE2 = &EXTOUTFILE2# [PROTOKOLL] PROTO = &PROTO_SEL# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo "Test 1" > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
